to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model

Class LocationMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model.Message
      • to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model.LocationMessage

  • public class LocationMessage
extends Message
    This Message contains information about the location of the car. The instances of this class are immutable.
    Author:
    sven

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float accuracy
      Accuracy of the location fix in meters.
      double altitude
      Altitude of the location fix.
      float bearing
      The direction of travel in degrees East of true North. // TODO: -180° to 180°?
      boolean hasAccuracy
      Contains this message information about accuracy?
      boolean hasAltitude
      Contains this message information about altitude?
      boolean hasBearing
      Contains this message information about the direction of travel.
      boolean hasSpeed
      Contains this message information about speed.
      double latitude
      Latitude of the location fix.
      double longitude
      Longitude of the location fix.
      float speed
      Speed of the car over ground in meters/second.

      • hasAccuracy

        public final boolean hasAccuracy
        Contains this message information about accuracy?

      • hasAltitude

        public final boolean hasAltitude
        Contains this message information about altitude?

      • hasBearing

        public final boolean hasBearing
        Contains this message information about the direction of travel.

      • hasSpeed

        public final boolean hasSpeed
        Contains this message information about speed.

      • latitude

        public final double latitude
        Latitude of the location fix. If location is shared (FeatureMessage.location) else 0.

      • longitude

        public final double longitude
        Longitude of the location fix. If location is shared (FeatureMessage.location) else 0.

      • altitude

        public final double altitude
        Altitude of the location fix. If location is shared (FeatureMessage.location) and hasAltitude else 0.

      • accuracy

        public final float accuracy
        Accuracy of the location fix in meters. If it's supported (FeatureMessage.location) and hasAccuracy else 0.

      • bearing

        public final float bearing
        The direction of travel in degrees East of true North. // TODO: -180° to 180°? If it's supported (FeatureMessage.location) and hasBearing else 0.

      • speed

        public final float speed
        Speed of the car over ground in meters/second.
